Description: Does the site have a clear increase in domain rating over the last 2 years?
Does the site have a natural link profile attributed to it?
Does the site have backlinks from at least 10 high-authority domains (DR 50+) in the past 12 months?
Does the site have a clear, consistent increase in referring domains over the last 12 months?
Is the anchor text profile of the website natural and NOT exact-match heavy?
Does the site have a spam score of 1% or less?
Do all key pages have optimised meta titles?
Do all pages have x1 H1 tag?
Are any pages missing a H1 tag?
Is the website's URL structure clear, concise and logical?
Do images have optimised alt text attributed to them on a consistent basis across the site?
Do images have optimised file names attributed to them on a consistent basis across the site?
Do all key pages have optimised meta descriptions?
If pagination exists, is it working correctly?
Are internal links optimised with varying anchor texts to key pages?
Check if robots.txt exists and is valid.
Check to see if any key URLs are blocked from indexing via robots.txt
Does sitemap.xml file exist?
Is the sitemap.xml referenced in the robots.txt file?
Is the sitemap.xml file structured clean and correct with categories?
Do URLs in sitemap.xml file return any 404 or 3xx errors?
Are there internal 404 errors firing on the website?
Are there any soft 404 errors firing on the website?
Are there any 5xx errors firing on the website?
Any missing meta titles?
Any duplicate meta titles?
Any duplicate meta descriptions?
Any missing meta descriptions?
Any key pages have a noindex tag attributed on them?
Are there internal redirects firing on the website?
Are there any redirect chains or loops firing on the website?
Are any key pages >3 clicks from the homepage?
Does critical content load without dependency of JavaScript (e.g. navigation/key HTML)?
Ensure that there are no mixed content errors occurring
Ensure there is no missing HSTS header
Ensure AI crawlers are not blocked in the robots.txt
Do the main URLs have self-referencing canonical tags that we want to rank?
Do any URLs canonicalise to a 404/non-indexable URL?
Any orphan pages on the website?
Does the website have organisation schema marked up correctly?
Is there any lorem ipsum placeholder text on the site?
Check the site is being linked/deployed using HTTPS consistently
Check the site is being linked/deployed using WWW/Non-WWW consistency and not both
Is there an about page that exists on the site?
Does the about page include details such as team members, company overview/history and company values?

Does the site have author profile landing pages with clear details about the author's expertise, including aspects such as an overview, links to social profiles and any blogs that author has written on the site?
Are there author bios included in the blog content pages with clickable links to the author landing pages?
Is there a date published/updated section on the blog content?
Is there a reviews page on the site?
Is there a reviews banner on the homepage/across the site?
Is there a privacy policy page on the site?
Is person schema added to the author pages with correct information?
If reviews are integrated on the site, do they have over 4.5 star rating?
Is there a T&Cs page on the site?
Does the website have links to their social media profiles in the footer of the site?
Is the favicon added to the site correctly and pulling through to the search results?
Is the 404 page optimised for users to navigate back to key pages on the site?
Is there a contact page with all of the key contact information displayed?
Is the copyright data in the footer and updated to this year?
Are open graphs tags implemented and optimised correctly?
Is the brand active across TikTok?
Is the brand active across YouTube?
Is the brand active across Instagram?
Is the brand active across Pinterest?
Are social comments and reviews being responded to and managed consistently?
Are brand handles and usernames consistent across all social search platforms?
Does content provide concise, direct answers to common questions (not buried in fluff)?
Are FAQ sections with Q&A format present on key pages?
Is comprehensive schema markup used (FAQ, HowTo, Article, Product, etc.)?
Is content regularly updated with visible last updated dates?
Does content thoroughly cover topics rather than shallow overviews?
Does the site publish original data, studies or unique insights that AI would cite?
Are key facts, definitions and stats formatted in easily extractable ways?
Is the brand/site recognised as an entity (appears in knowledge panels, Wikipedia etc)?
Is LCP under 2.5 seconds?
Is INP under 200ms?
Is CLS under 0.1?
Does the site score 75+ on mobile in PageSpeed Insights?
Does the site score 75+ on desktop in PageSpeed Insights?
Is the site fully responsive and mobile-friendly?
Is uncompressed HTML size under 2mb?
Is server response time under 800ms?
Are images compressed and using modern formats (WebP/AVIF)?
Are critical CSS/JS files optimised to not block rendering?
Does the site operate with gzip compression?
The website does not have a carbon rating of 'F' using the carbon footprint calculator
Do collection pages have product carousels that link to individual product pages?
Is there a filter system that works and canonicalises correctly to the collection URL?
There are clear, optimised H1s on key collection pages for focus keyword intents.
Key collection pages are accessible from navigation/homepage.
Do collection pages have a brief description underneath the H1?
Has alt text been added to product images in the product carousel?
Collection pages have no CLS occurring.
There is a clear URL structure in place for collection pages for the CMS it operates on.
There is a clear CTA for each product in the product carousel.
Breadcrumbs are added to collection pages and structurally correct.
Do collection pages have FAQs added to the bottom with FAQ schema added?
There is a reviews banner/carousel integrated on collection pages.
Product pages have clear pricing for users to see.
Product schema is added to product pages and validated.
Product pages show stock availability.
Product review star rating is visible.
Product pages have clear specs and features visible and accessible.
Product pages have clear return and refund policies information.
Product pages have clear shipping information.
Product has the correct Google Merchant Center data.
Product pages have no CLS occurring.
Product images are high quality.
Product images have optimised alt text.
Product pages have clear warranty information on the page.
Product pages have clear customer support/contact information displayed.
A verified GBP exists and has been claimed.
The business name is correct and specific to the location.
The business address is correct and specific to the location.
The business phone number is correct and specific to the location.
The business website is correct and points to the correct landing page.
The primary business category is correct.
Reviews are being answered consistently.
The business working hours are correct and match the landing page.
Secondary business categories are present and accurate.
The profile has a complete description.
The logo is uploaded and accurate.
The cover image is a wide exterior photo showcasing the location.
The profile has interior and exterior photos added.
The profile includes services with descriptions (if applicable).
The business has a consistent flow of high-quality reviews.
The business holiday hours have correctly been added.
The profile contains links to all relevant social profiles.
The business service area is included (where applicable).
The profile has a team photo.
All questions on the profile have been answered (if applicable).
The profile has a video asset.
Is the H1 optimised for the local search intent it should be targeting?
Is the metadata optimised for the local search intent it should be targeting?
The landing page includes the address, opening hours and contact details for users to see.
LocalBusiness schema is added to the landing page.
The landing page includes a high-quality image of the store.
Google Business Profile reviews are integrated onto the page.
Google Maps is integrated onto the landing page.
Clear CTAs are added for booking appointments/getting directions.
The images on the landing page have optimised alt text added.
There are FAQs about the store added with FAQ schema attributed.
The facilities of the store are included.
There is a section of the team who runs the store for trust.
Hreflang has correctly been implemented across the domain.
All of the content is not duplicated/the same across each separate location area of the site.
There are no geolocation redirects automatically triggering/set up on the site.
There is a clear difference in metadata for each country.
A clear hreflang XML sitemap exists.
The logic of the site does not use subdomains to separate the different country versions (uses subdirectories).
Users can choose their language clearly on the site from an option/selection widget/CTA.
Crawling and navigating between the different versions of the site is a simple and clear process.
